channel.title: Radogs
channel.description:
# Radogs
![image|360x360](upload://lf2ZKTEqrQU6U8GOQNBwBK5W4cn.png)
>Radog NFTs are created by two Radix enthusiasts. It started with the desire to make full use of the Radix network and to test it out. What better way to explore the Radix universe than with the most loyal NFT ever made on the Radix network by your side: The Radog. Radogs come in many forms and with many accessories. For every taste, their is a loyal companion. Woof! >**ONLY 10.000 RADOGS CREATED** No more, no less. There will never be a second batch. Make sure to get all the Radogs you want before they run out. >**INTEGRATED WITH THE RADIX WALLET** Our reservation and minting system is fully integrated and automated with the Radix network and wallet. >**UNLIMITED RESERVATIONS** No limit on the reservation amount due to the automated nature. We want to strive to make full use of the Radix network. **Price of each NFT**: 25 XRD **Links**: * [Website](https://radogs.tech) * [Store](https://app.radogs.tech) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Radogsnft/)

item.title: Radogs

item.description:
Radogs

Radog NFTs are created by two Radix enthusiasts. It started with the desire to make full use of the Radix network and to test it out. What better way to explore the Radix universe than with the most loyal NFT ever made on the Radix network by your side: The Radog. Radogs come in many forms and with many accessories. For every taste, their is a loyal companion. Woof!

ONLY 10.000 RADOGS CREATED
No more, no less. There will never be a second batch. Make sure to get all the Radogs you want before they run out.

INTEGRATED WITH THE RADIX WALLET
Our reservation and minting system is fully integrated and automated with the Radix network and wallet.

UNLIMITED RESERVATIONS
No limit on the reservation amount due to the automated nature. We want to strive to make full use of the Radix network.

Price of each NFT: 25 XRD

  • Store
